cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.adapters

Class OwnedInstrumentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter
        • cmput301w16t08.scaling_pancake.adapters.OwnedInstrumentAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class OwnedInstrumentAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter
    Provides a custom adapter for Instruments that are owned by the currently logged in user. Populates the InstrumentListActivity when the "Owned" option is chosen from the spinner.
    See Also:
    Instrument
